misconduct.translation[0].definitions[0]: bad or dishonest behaviour by someone in a position of authority or trust
a doctor who has been accused of professional misconduct
He was fired for serious misconduct.
She was found guilty of gross misconduct  (=very serious misconduct).
misconduct.translation[1].definitions[0]: bad or dishonest behaviour by a professional person
the penalties for such misconduct as fraudulent trading or theft
